articles.title: Russia-Ukraine live news: First wheat export under UN deal
articles.description: Two more ships carrying wheat leave Black Sea ports as part of UN-brokered deal, Turkish defence ministry says.
articles.content:
blinking-dot
Live updatesLive updates, 
Turkeys defence ministry says two more ships have left from Ukrainian ports bringing total number of ships to depart country under UN-brokered deal to 14.
